articles.author: Rachel Chason, John Hudson, Greg Miller
articles.title: Prigozhin's rebellion raises questions about Wagner's African footprint - The Washington Post
articles.description: A Kremlin crackdown on Wagner would have far-reaching consequences in Africa and the Middle East, where the mercenary group supplied firepower to despots.
articles.content:
